Class NavigationStudyControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.vexillum.control.GenericControl<ItemNavigationStudy>
      • br.ueg.tcc.bookway.control.NavigationStudyControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    br.com.vexillum.control.IGenericControl<ItemNavigationStudy>

    @Service
@Scope(value="prototype")
public class NavigationStudyControl
extends br.com.vexillum.control.GenericControl<ItemNavigationStudy>
    Controle responsável por gerir as regras da navegação de estudo e as suas regras de negócio.
    Author:
    pedro
